main event: On the night of May 7, 1973, witnesses observed a bright light in the sky that hovered and then shot straight up at high speeds multiple times.
interesting points: The object was observed to be round or oval in shape,The object exhibited hovering behavior before rapidly ascending several times,The sky was clear during the sighting with no moon,The witnesses found the experience unnerving and unusual,No physical evidence or photographs were discovered after the sighting.
witness description: a husband and wife standing on their porch
